original_title: KEMI : La Fatalité entre Responsabilité et Destin
overview: In 1964 in a village in Bénin, an oracle predicts a bright future but also a bad omen for the baby KEMI. Sixteen years later, the future of KEMI, now a brilliant student, is called into question by the authority of her selfish and corrupt father, who offers her in marriage to a rich polygamist.
title: KEMI : La Fatalité entre Responsabilité et Destin
